testcase.purpose: Test that RTL direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the width attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the height attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test if the UA can process the id attribute of a widget element correctly when the id is spaces.
Test if the UA can ignore subsequent three repetitions of the description element correctly.
Test if the UA can process the id attribute of a widget element correctly.
Test if the user agent can process localized description elements by ignoring languages it doesn't know.
Test if the user agent can process localized description elements correctly.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the viewmodes attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the name element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the name attribute of the preference element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the value attribute of the preference element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the readonly attribute of the preference element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the width attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the height attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that LTR direction does not apply to the viewmodes attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the name element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the name attribute of the preference element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the value attribute of the preference element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the readonly attribute of the preference element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the width attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the height attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test that RLO direction does not apply to the viewmodes attribute of the widget element.
Test that RTL direction applies to the name element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the name attribute of the preference element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the value attribute of the preference element.
Test that RTL direction does not apply to the readonly attribute of the preference element.
Test that the value of the defaultlocale works in conjunction to xml:lang on the widget element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the name attribute of the preference element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the value attribute of the preference element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the readonly attribute of the preference element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the href attribute of the author element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the email attribute of the author element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the width attribute of the widget element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the height attribute of the widget element.
Test that LRO direction does not apply to the id attribute of the widget element.
Test that LRO direction applies to the version attribute of the widget element.
Test if the UA can process the height attribute.
Test if the UA can process the empty height attribute.
Test if the UA can skip the preference element without a name attribute.
Test if the UA can skip the preference element already defined.
Test if the UA can make a case-sensitive comparison on the value of the readonly attribute.
Test if the UA can set the readonly attribute to false by default.
Test if the user agent can process an author element correctly.
Test if the user agent can apply the rule to get the value of the single authorEmail attribute correctly.
Test if the user agent can handle an empty author element.
Test if the user agent can process the author href attribute correctly.
Test if the user agent can apply the rule to get the value of a single shortName attribute correctly.
Test if the UA can process the specific height attribute correctly.
Test if the UA can process the specific id attribute of a widget element correctly.
Test if the UA can process the given id attribute of a widget element correctly.
Test if the user agent can apply the algorithm to locate a default start file, when no custom start file is presented.
Test if the user agent can ignore subsequent repetitions of the author element.
Test if the user agent can skip multiple preference elements already defined.
Test if the user agent can store preferences whose names vary only in case.
Test if support XML, XMLNS, and UTF-8.
Test if the user agent can ignore subsequent repetitions of the name element.
Test if the user agent can ignore subsequent repetitions of the description element.
Test if the user agent can select the description element when the xml:lang attribute is presented.
Test if the user agent can process the width attribute.
Test if the user agent can process the description element.
Test if the user agent can process the version attribute.
Test if the user agent can process the specific version attribute.
Test if the user agent can apply the rule to get text content to a description element.
